meta_title: What is an OEM? Definition and Strategic Importance
meta_description: Understand the definition of Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) and how it impacts asset lifecycle management, maintenance costs, and warranty compliance.
title: What Does Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) Mean?
keyword: what does original equipment manufacturer mean

image_prompt: A high-angle, professional photo of a modern, clean industrial manufacturing floor. One engineer is holding a digital tablet showing technical schematics. The lighting is bright and clinical, emphasizing the precision and high-tech nature of the OEM equipment. No text.
